div.h1: Status report for the Apache ActiveMQ Project

script.class: brush: java; gutter: false; theme: Default

div.script:
Apologies for missing the April board report deadline.
Community: * The ActiveMQ project has had another very busy but quiet quarter. * The development and user lists continue to stay vibrant.
Development: * Working towards an ActiveMQ 5.4 release.
Releases: * ActiveMQ 5.3.2 * ActiveMQ-CPP 3.1.2 * ActiveMQ 5.3.1 * ActiveMQ-CPP 3.1.1 * Apache.NMS.ActiveMQ v1.2.0 * Apache.NMS.Stomp v1.2.0 * Apache.NMS API 1.2.0
